General.Name: OceanaGold Corporation
General.Description: OceanaGold Corporation, a gold producer, engages in exploration, development, and operation of mineral properties. It explores for gold, copper, and silver deposits. The company holds interest in the Didipio gold and copper project located in the Luzon, Philippines; the Macraes goldfield project in the South Island of New Zealand; Waihi gold project in the North Island of New Zealand; and the Haile gold project located in Kershaw, South Carolina, the United States. OceanaGold Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 99 Melbourne Street, South Brisbane, QLD, Australia, 4101
